DOC.brief_summary: To compare effect different VPT method use Calcium Enriched Mixture ( CEM ) cement management human dental pulp irreversible pulpitis .
DOC.brief_title: Vital Pulp Therapy ( VPT ) Using Calcium Enriched Mixture ( CEM ) Treat Irreversible Pulpitis
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose randomize clinical trial demonstrate effect four method Vital Pulp Therapy ( VPT ) use new endodontic bio-material [ calcium enrich mixture ( CEM ) cement ] pain relief well clinical/radiographic success , management irreversible pulpitis human permanent teeth .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Carious permanent vital mature molar tooth close apex ( preoperative Xray ) 2 . Positive response EPT cold test 3. patient willing participate study 4 . Healthy subject ; absence systematic disorder 5 . Age â‰¥ 10 year old 6 . Both gender 7 . Written inform consent 1 . Moderate severe periodontitis ; pocket > 3mm 2 . None restorable tooth 3 . Internal external root resorption 4 . Root canal calcification 5 . Non vital pulp 6 . Analgesic take within last 8h 7 . Active systemic disease 8 . Pregnancy nurse 9 . History opioid addiction/abuse 10 . Temporary residency
